description: We are seeking a motivated engineer with excellent cross-functional coordination and problem-solving capabilities. You will be responsible for supporting our testing efforts at our offshore facilities, taking the lead in scheduling and coordinating the test execution of IO technologies and features across our platforms. You will be required to be hands-on with testing, triaging, investigating and debugging issues. Adapting test plans to take account of operational needs, managing issue tracking, managing and reporting on test execution across programs, and assisting in plans to scale our test coverage over time.
preferred_qualifications: Practical scripting experience with scenarios such as triaging and routing issues, extracting, manipulating data or streamlining workflows and test automation. Familiarity with IO technologies such as USB, Thunderbolt or DisplayPort/HDMI, and able to ramp-up quickly on new and existing technologies is highly desirable. Familiarity with C programming will be an added plus. Familiarity with data visualization, trend analysis and report creation using tools such as Tableau. Willingness and ability to travel between sites.
